trading.stopProfitDescription: When the mark price ≥ USDT, the position will be closed at the best price. Quantity is BTC, estimated profit is USDT ( ).
trading.stopLossDescription: When the mark price ≤ USDT, the position will be closed at the best price. Quantity is BTC, estimated profit is USDT ( ).
trading.closeAtBestPrice: When the mark price ≥ {profitPrice} USDT, the position will be closed at the best price. Quantity: {available} {symbol}, estimated profit: {expectedProfit} USDT ({profitPercentage}%).
trading.closeAtBestPriceWhenLoss: When the mark price ≤ {lossPrice} USDT, the position will be closed at the best price. Quantity: {available} {symbol}, estimated loss: {expectedLoss} USDT ({lossPercentage}%).
trading.networkWarning: Warning: Select the same network as the withdrawal platform, otherwise the funds may be lost.
trading.onlyDepositToThisAddress: You can only deposit {selectedNetwork} to this address. Depositing other assets will result in a loss.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: KeepBit is a safe and transparent digital asset derivatives trading platform. Guided by the values of 'User First, Simplicity, Transparency, and Trust,' we focus on providing investors with one-stop digital asset financial services.

list.title: Safe and Reliable Trading Platform

agencyPlan.title: Agent Level Standard Description
agencyPlan.commissionRule: Agent Commission Rule (Note: The assessment standard for each agent is 20,000 or more. Those who do not meet the standard will only receive 10% of the trading fees from the friends they invite.)
agencyPlan.inviteRule: Invite friends to join KeepBit through your exclusive invitation link or referral code. When their deposit amount is ≥1000U, you will receive a 10% commission on their trading fees. Once the invited friend’s total assets reach ≥20000U, they can be upgraded to an agent and enjoy a 10% trading fee + corresponding agent level strategy profit-sharing commission.
agencyPlan.level2: Level 2: ≥20000, Trading Fee 10%, Profit Sharing Commission 15%
agencyPlan.level3: Level 3: ≥100000, Trading Fee 10%, Profit Sharing Commission 20%
agencyPlan.level4: Level 4: ≥500000, Trading Fee 10%, Profit Sharing Commission 25%
agencyPlan.level5: Level 5 (Junior Partner): ≥1000000, Trading Fee 15%, Profit Sharing Commission 35%
agencyPlan.level6: Level 6 (Intermediate Partner): ≥2000000, Trading Fee 20%, Profit Sharing Commission 40%
agencyPlan.level7: Level 7 (Senior Partner): ≥3000000, Trading Fee 25%, Profit Sharing Commission 45%
agencyPlan.commissionCalculation: Commission Calculation: When a friend’s trading generates 100USDT in fees, you will receive 10USDT (100 * 10%) as commission.
agencyPlan.profitSharingCalculation: Profit Sharing Calculation: Profit from online friends’ strategies (ended strategies) is shared according to the VIP level of the account. Total profit sharing amount × agent level profit sharing ratio = profit commission.
agencyPlan.subAgentCommission: Sub-agent Commission: Sub-agents who invite friends to join KeepBit will have their friends' total assets considered in their sub-agent level assessment. When the total assets of the invited friends exceed 20000U, they will automatically be upgraded to sub-agents and can earn 5% profit sharing from their direct referrals' profits. Sub-agents will also receive standard trading fee rebates and profit commissions.
agencyPlan.agentLevelAssessment: Agent and Partner Level Assessment: The total assets of direct clients and sub-agent direct clients are combined to assess the agent and partner level (Note: Only direct clients and sub-agent direct clients’ assets are considered for the commission).
agencyPlan.notesContent: The全民代理 (universal agent) model means anyone can become an agent. The company treats all agents fairly and equally. The system evaluates agent levels based on total assets daily and automatically calculates the trading fee and profit sharing commissions.
agencyPlan.agentExampleTitle: Agent Commission and Level Assessment Example:
agencyPlan.agentADetails: Direct clients (A-01 to A-05) total assets 60,000U + Sub-agent A-05’s direct clients (B-06 to B-09) total assets 40,000U = 100,000U = Level 3 Agent
agencyPlan.agentACommissionDetails:
Direct clients (A-01 to A-05) Trading Fee 10% + Profit Sharing Commission 20%
Sub-agent A-05’s direct clients (B-06 to B-09) Profit Sharing Commission 5%
agencyPlan.agentA05Details: Direct clients (B-06 to B-09) total assets 40,000U + Sub-agent B-09’s direct clients (C-10 to C-12) total assets 15,000U = 55,000U = Level 2 Agent
agencyPlan.agentA05CommissionDetails: Direct clients (B-06 to B-09) Trading Fee 10% + Profit Sharing Commission 15%
agencyPlan.subAgentB09Details: Direct clients (C-10 to C-12) total assets 15,000U = Level 1 Agent
agencyPlan.subAgentB09CommissionDetails: Direct clients (C-10 to C-12) Trading Fee 10%
agencyPlan.agentSystemDetails: Each agent can log in with their email and password to view details. This will be integrated into the app later, allowing everyone to clearly see their daily efforts.
agencyPlan.opportunityTitle: Opportunity! The right perspective helps you reach new heights!
agencyPlan.striveTitle: Strive! The results of hard work belong to you!

agreement.title: KeepBit Service Terms
agreement.subtitle: Please read the following terms carefully before using this service.
agreement.effectDate: These terms of service will be effective for all users from April 2, 2024.
agreement.importantNotice: Important Notice: The products and services provided on KeepBit.com are not suitable for individuals or institutions from illegal sources. No content on KeepBit.com shall be construed as solicitation for users worldwide. By accepting these terms of service, you acknowledge that you have received and confirmed the above notice.
agreement.generalText: Welcome to www.KeepBit.com (this 'website'). These terms of service ('Agreement') form an agreement between you (referred to as 'you' or 'your') and the KeepBit operators (defined below, referred to as 'we'). This agreement governs your use of this website/application, your account, and services (defined below).
agreement.readTerms: Please carefully read all terms and conditions of this agreement, the privacy policy terms, important information and risk disclaimers related to the use of the KeepBit platform, as well as any other agreements applicable to you before using the services.
agreement.qualificationText: In order to use the services, you must meet the following qualifications:
agreement.qualificationItem1: If you are an individual, you must be at least 18 years old to create an account and use the services.
agreement.qualificationItem2: You are not within or under the control of prohibited jurisdictions such as Afghanistan, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, and Canada (all referred to as 'Prohibited Jurisdictions'), nor are you a national or resident of these countries, or a person listed on the economic sanctions list issued by relevant authorities ('Prohibited Persons').
agreement.qualificationItem3: You may not provide any access to or store digital assets or services for individuals from Prohibited Jurisdictions, their nationals, or Prohibited Persons.
agreement.qualificationItem4: If a state, province, region, or country becomes a Prohibited Jurisdiction, or we decide independently that you are in such a jurisdiction, we may cancel and/or suspend your account or block transactions that do not meet the qualifications outlined in this agreement, with or without notice.
agreement.accountInfo: 1.1 To use the services, you must create an account. You will be asked to provide certain registration details and identification information for each account holder. We may refuse to open an account for any person at our discretion. We do not allow duplicate accounts and will open only one account per user.
agreement.phoneEmail: 1.3 You will need to provide a valid phone number and email address to create an account, which may require our verification, and you must set a password for your account.
agreement.servicesListIntro: This website allows users to create, host, maintain, and provide services to buy and sell digital assets through the internet. Specifically, our services include:
agreement.digitalAssetRiskText: The risk of using services is entirely borne by you and can be significant. We do not provide investment, tax, or legal advice. All transactions are automatically executed based on your instructions, and you are solely responsible for determining whether any transaction, trading strategy, or related trade is suitable for you based on your personal investment goals, financial situation, and risk tolerance. No guarantee of loss prevention is provided.
agreement.feesText: We may charge fees for using any or all of the services. You can view the fee schedule for specific services on the website and application. Transfer fees for digital assets. We reserve the right to charge fees for transferring digital assets into or out of your account. Your digital asset wallet service provider may also charge transaction fees and other fees related to transferring digital assets to your account.
agreement.modificationsText: We may revise, modify, update, and change any of the terms and conditions contained in this agreement from time to time. We will notify you of any revisions, modifications, updates, or changes by posting a new version of the agreement here or by notifying you via email. Any new version of the agreement will become effective immediately after being posted on the website or application, and your use of the website, application, and/or services after any changes to this agreement will be deemed to indicate your acceptance of the new version of the agreement.
agreement.userDeclarationText:
By using the services, you explicitly declare and warrant:
1. You have the legal authority to enter into this agreement;
2. You will use this website, application, and services according to our terms of use and fulfill all of your obligations;
3. Your use of the services will comply with all applicable laws in your jurisdiction, and you will not use the services for any illegal activity as defined by applicable laws;
4. You are using the services for yourself only and not on behalf of any third party;
5. Any digital assets used in connection with the services are your property and have a legal origin.
agreement.thankYou: Thank you for reading our service agreement.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Please read the following disclaimer carefully
disclaimer.overview: Important information and risk disclaimer regarding the use of the KeepBit platform
disclaimer.overviewText: By accessing the website https://www.KeepBit.com and any of its pages, as well as the KeepBit mobile application (available for download in the app stores for iOS and Android mobile operating systems) (collectively referred to as the 'Platform'), you acknowledge that you have read the following information, accept the terms and conditions listed below, and agree to be bound by this document. The terms 'you' or 'your' in this document refer to you individually and any other persons you represent, as needed, to access the Platform.
disclaimer.generalText: The Platform operates globally under the brand name 'KeepBit' ('KeepBit', 'we', or 'our').
disclaimer.generalText2: The content on the Platform has not been reviewed by any regulatory authority. If you have any concerns regarding the content, you should seek independent professional advice.
disclaimer.usSpecificText: The information on the Platform is not targeted at or intended for distribution to residents of any state, territory, or possession of the United States, or any other 'U.S. person' within the meaning of Regulation S under the U.S. Securities Act of 1933 (the 'Securities Act').
disclaimer.usSpecificText2: Any digital assets described on the Platform are not registered under the Securities Act and may not be offered or sold in the United States or to U.S. persons unless under an applicable exemption or pursuant to any determination by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) that such digital assets are regulated.
disclaimer.canadaSpecificText: No securities commission or similar authority in Canada has reviewed or approved the merits of the information on the Platform, and any contrary statement is a criminal offense.
disclaimer.noOfferText: The content on the Platform is for informational and fair trading purposes only, and does not constitute an offer to purchase, sell, or otherwise acquire or dispose of any securities, nor is it an investment advice.
disclaimer.noAdviceText: The Platform allows clients who have registered accounts with KeepBit to engage in digital asset trading. The AI quantitative trading system can place orders with KeepBit's strategic partner platforms (e.g., Bitget or Binance) based on aggregated open positions after the client activates a strategy.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRisk: Risk of Digital Asset Trading and Investment
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskText: As a client or potential client of the Platform, you should understand the following before making any payments or digital asset transfers to KeepBit:
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem1: KeepBit may not hold the necessary licenses to offer services in your jurisdiction.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem2: If you are unfamiliar with the digital asset, you should not engage in trading it.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem3: You should be aware that the value of digital assets may fluctuate significantly.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem4: Past performance is not indicative of future results.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem5: Investing in any digital assets offered on the Platform carries significant risk.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem6: The digital asset trading and investment options available on the Platform are not suitable for everyone.
disclaimer.digitalAssetRiskItem7: We may independently decide to open and/or maintain external wallets/accounts with third-party digital asset wallet solution providers and/or external digital asset trading counterparties.
disclaimer.noGuaranteeText: Although KeepBit sincerely believes that the information provided on the Platform is accurate and up-to-date, it makes no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy or completeness of such information.
disclaimer.liabilityLimitText: Except as explicitly stated in the Terms of Use, KeepBit makes no representations or warranties.
disclaimer.amlCtfCompliance: Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorism Financing (AML/CTF) and Regulatory Compliance
disclaimer.amlCtfComplianceText: KeepBit is committed to complying with all applicable laws, regulations, and regulatory standards related to AML/CTF.
disclaimer.websiteAvailabilityText: The Platform is accessible on computers and mobile devices running the KeepBit application.
disclaimer.supportDeskText: KeepBit maintains an online support desk on the Platform to assist with your questions about the Platform.
disclaimer.privacyText: KeepBit is committed to safeguarding the privacy, confidentiality, and security of personal information or data collected in accordance with all applicable data protection laws.

easyMoneyClause.title: KeepBit Easy Earn Terms
easyMoneyClause.section1Text1: 1.1 By subscribing to KeepBit Easy Earn, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted all the terms and conditions of the KeepBit Easy Earn Terms, and you agree to be bound by and comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not fully understand and accept these terms, you must not subscribe.
easyMoneyClause.section1Text2: 1.2 By subscribing to Easy Earn, you can earn rewards specified by KeepBit and agreed to by you before each transaction. However, unless explicitly stated by KeepBit, subscribing to Easy Earn does not guarantee principal or rewards.
easyMoneyClause.section2Text1: 2.1 When you subscribe to Easy Earn, the system will prompt you to agree to some or all of the following terms:
easyMoneyClause.section2Item2: 2.1.2 The asset and its amount that you will use for subscription;
easyMoneyClause.section2Item3: 2.1.3 Whether you are subscribing to a flexible or fixed-term Easy Earn, and if fixed-term, the duration (including start and end dates) and settlement date of Easy Earn.
easyMoneyClause.section2Text2: 2.2 KeepBit may set a minimum asset amount required for subscribing to Easy Earn, and/or may apply any restrictions at its discretion.
easyMoneyClause.section2Text3: 2.3 Unless explicitly stated by KeepBit, KeepBit does not guarantee your principal.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text1: 3.1 After subscribing to Easy Earn, KeepBit may determine whether to set a reward rate based on the product terms.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text2: If a reward rate is defined in the product terms at the time of subscription, the reward will accumulate starting from the start date of each Easy Earn transaction, as specified by KeepBit and agreed to by you before subscription.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text3: The reward will be provided in the same digital asset form as your Easy Earn.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text4: The reward will be calculated based on the Easy Earn reward rate agreed upon before subscription.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text5: Rewards will be allocated to your KeepBit account on the agreed asset distribution date.
easyMoneyClause.section3Text6: Rewards are rounded to the decimal point, and specific figures may vary depending on the digital asset.
easyMoneyClause.section4Text1: 4.1 KeepBit will return the Easy Earn assets to you on the agreed asset distribution date.
easyMoneyClause.section4Text2: 4.2 Early redemption is not supported. This means the assets you subscribed to Easy Earn and any rewards will not be redeemed before the settlement date.
easyMoneyClause.section4Text3: 4.3 In certain cases, including but not limited to market volatility, network delays, or other unforeseen events, your redemption may be delayed. KeepBit will make commercially reasonable efforts to redeem your assets.
easyMoneyClause.section4Text4: 4.4 Automatic Subscription. Based on the terms and conditions of each Easy Earn transaction, KeepBit may decide to allow you to automatically subscribe to a new Easy Earn transaction on the settlement date using the Easy Earn assets from a previous transaction.
easyMoneyClause.section4Text5: 4.5 However, KeepBit reserves the right not to act according to your automatic subscription instructions. It may refuse to follow these instructions for any reason, including but not limited to reaching the subscription limit for an Easy Earn transaction.
easyMoneyClause.section5Title: 5. Stopping, Suspending, or Cancelling Your Easy Earn Transactions
easyMoneyClause.section5Text1: 5.1 KeepBit may stop, suspend, or cancel your access to Easy Earn or delay certain transactions in the following cases:
easyMoneyClause.section5Item1: 5.1.1 You have not provided additional information to verify your identity or source of funds as requested by KeepBit;
easyMoneyClause.section5Item2: 5.1.2 KeepBit must do so in compliance with a court order or applicable laws (including anti-money laundering or sanctions laws), applicable laws refer to all relevant or applicable regulations, laws (including common law rules), equity principles, rules, regulations, regulatory principles and requirements, notices, orders, warrants, injunctions, judgments, rules, decisions, directives, announcements, circulars, mandatory codes of conduct, guidelines, practices, and interpretations (whether applicable to the provision, receipt, or use of KeepBit services or any other products or deliverables related to KeepBit services);
easyMoneyClause.section5Item3: 5.1.3 KeepBit must do so in accordance with the instructions or directions of government authorities or agencies;
easyMoneyClause.section5Item4: 5.1.4 KeepBit reasonably determines that any information you have provided to KeepBit is incorrect, false, outdated, or incomplete; or
easyMoneyClause.section5Item5: 5.1.5 You have not provided the requested additional information in a reasonable or timely manner as required by us.
easyMoneyClause.section6Text1: 6.1 KeepBit may suspend access to Easy Earn, your KeepBit account, and/or the KeepBit platform from time to time for routine or emergency maintenance. KeepBit will make reasonable efforts to ensure that transactions on the platform are processed in a timely manner, but KeepBit makes no representations or guarantees regarding the time required for processing, as this depends on many factors beyond our control.
easyMoneyClause.section6Text2: 6.2 While KeepBit makes reasonable efforts to update the information on the platform, we make no representations, warranties, or guarantees, either express or implied, that the content on the platform (including information related to KeepBit services) is accurate, complete, or up-to-date.
easyMoneyClause.section6Text3: 6.3 You are responsible for obtaining the necessary data network access to use KeepBit services. You are responsible for obtaining and updating the compatible hardware or devices required to access and use KeepBit services, platform, and any updates. KeepBit does not guarantee that KeepBit services or any part thereof will run on any specific hardware or device. KeepBit services may experience failures and delays inherent in using the internet and electronic communications.
easyMoneyClause.section7Text1: 7.1 All terms and references used in the KeepBit Easy Earn Terms and all terms and references defined and interpreted in the KeepBit Terms of Service, but not defined or interpreted in these terms, shall have the same meaning and interpretation as in the Terms of Service.
easyMoneyClause.section7Text2: 7.2 The KeepBit Easy Earn Terms should be read in conjunction with the Terms of Service. In the event of any conflict or inconsistency between the KeepBit Easy Earn Terms and the Terms of Service, the KeepBit Easy Earn Terms shall prevail.
easyMoneyClause.section7Text3: 7.3 KeepBit will use the details you provide to contact you. This may include contacting you via email, SMS, or phone. Please ensure that your contact details are correct and up-to-date. If your contact details change, you must notify us immediately. Otherwise, KeepBit will not be liable if you do not receive any communications, notices, or other important information from us.

privacyPolicyIndex.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyIndex.section1Text1: This Privacy Policy applies to your personal information when you visit this website or use our services. It explains how we collect, retain, process, share, and transfer your personal information when you visit this website or use our services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section1Text2: This Privacy Policy is designed to help you understand our privacy practices and assist you in understanding your privacy choices while using this website and our services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section1Text3: If you have questions about our privacy practices that are not mentioned in this Privacy Policy, please contact us at service@keepbit.top.
privacyPolicyIndex.section1Text4: This Privacy Policy is incorporated by reference into any terms of service provided on the website or through our services. By using the services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with or are dissatisfied with any part of this Privacy Policy, you should immediately stop using the services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section1Text5: Once you accept this Privacy Policy, any personal information we collect before your acceptance will also be governed by the terms of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicyIndex.section2Item1: ‘Account’ refers to a user account on this website.
privacyPolicyIndex.section2Item2: ‘Personal Information’ refers to information that can be related to an identified or identifiable individual. Personal Information may include your name, postal address, phone number, email address, financial account details, account number, date of birth, and government-issued credentials (such as driver’s license number, national ID, passport, and taxpayer identification number). Personal Information does not include information that cannot identify a specific individual.
privacyPolicyIndex.section2Item3: ‘Service’ refers to any website, API tool, or mobile application we own or operate, as well as all services, features, functions, and content provided through the website and API tools.
privacyPolicyIndex.section2Item4: ‘Website’ refers to this website www.keepbit.com, as well as our mobile applications, official social media platforms, or other online assets where we provide services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section2Item5: ‘User’ refers to individuals who have successfully registered on this website.
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Title: 3. What Personal Information Do We Collect?
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Text1: When you visit our website or use the services, we may collect information about you, including the following:
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Item1: Registration Information: When you create an account or use the services, we may ask for your name, postal address, phone number, and email address to create an account.
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Item2: Verification Information: When you use the services, we may ask you to provide additional personal information to verify your identity, source of funds, and address.
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Item3: Transaction and Experience Information: When you use the services, we may collect information about transactions, including your digital wallet address, IP address, and details about your browser or device.
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Item4: Information from Third-Party Sources: Where permitted by law, we may obtain information from third-party sources such as public databases and verification partners.
privacyPolicyIndex.section3Item5: Other Information: We may also collect other information, such as that which you provide when communicating with us via email or customer support.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Title: 4. How Do We Process Personal Information?
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Text1: We may process your information for the following purposes:
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item1: Operating the website and providing services, including account management, verifying access, processing transactions, etc.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item2: Managing our business needs, such as monitoring, analyzing, and improving the services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item3: Verifying your identity and enhancing security, combating malicious software, ensuring compliance with applicable laws.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item4: Providing convenience for third parties by processing personal information related to services provided by third parties.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item5: Customizing advertising content based on your preferences, conducting marketing.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item6: Complying with our legal obligations and enforcing service terms.
privacyPolicyIndex.section4Item7: Providing customer support, handling your requests, and resolving disputes.
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Title: 5. How Do We Use Cookies and Tracking Technologies?
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Text1: When you visit this website or use the services, we may use cookies, pixel tags, local storage, and other tracking technologies (collectively referred to as ‘Cookies’) to automatically collect information for the following purposes:
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Item1: To recognize you as a user and customize your online experience.
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Item2: To measure the effectiveness of promotions and perform analysis.
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Item3: To help us understand how users interact with the services and to improve the services, offering enhanced features while you use the services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Item4: To help prevent potential fraudulent activities and enhance security.
privacyPolicyIndex.section5Text2: If you wish to opt-out of the use of cookies, you can adjust your settings in your browser or device. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect some website features.
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Title: 6. Do We Share Your Personal Information?
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Text1: We may share your personal information with the following parties in accordance with this Privacy Policy:
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Item1: With other members of our corporate family.
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Item2: With third parties that provide services.
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Item3: With other third parties who protect our business interests and users.
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Item4: In accordance with legal requirements or requests from law enforcement.
privacyPolicyIndex.section6Item5: With your consent, with third parties.
privacyPolicyIndex.section7Title: 7. Why Do We Retain Personal Information?
privacyPolicyIndex.section7Text1: We retain personal information to fulfill our legal obligations, business needs, or service terms. We will retain your personal information as needed and ensure compliance with applicable laws.
privacyPolicyIndex.section8Title: 8. How Do We Protect Your Personal Information?
privacyPolicyIndex.section8Text1: We take technical, physical, and administrative measures aimed at protecting your personal information from loss, misuse, or unauthorized access. However, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of information.
privacyPolicyIndex.section9Text1: This website and services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18 (‘Minors’). We do not intentionally collect personal information from minors.
privacyPolicyIndex.section10Title: 10. Third-Party Websites and Social Media Platforms
privacyPolicyIndex.section10Text1: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. The information you provide on those websites will be governed by their respective privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their privacy or security practices.
privacyPolicyIndex.section11Text1: Changes to this Privacy Policy. We may periodically revise, modify, or replace this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our business, website, services, or applicable laws.
privacyPolicyIndex.section11Text2: Transfer of Your Personal Information to Other Countries. Our operations are supported by computer networks, cloud-based servers, and other infrastructure and information technology (including but not limited to third-party service providers).
privacyPolicyIndex.section12Text1: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, you can contact us via email at service@keepbit.com.
privacyPolicyIndex.footer: Copyright ©2024 KeepBit Inc. All Rights Reserved.

serviceAgreement.title: Margin Financing Agreement
serviceAgreement.section1Text1: If you apply for margin financing services through our website, this Margin Financing Agreement ('MFA') will apply to you in addition to the KeepBit Terms of Service. In case of any inconsistency between this MFA and the KeepBit Terms of Service, the MFA will prevail.
serviceAgreement.section1Text2: We provide this section to inform you of some basic facts about margin asset purchases and to remind you of the risks involved in margin trading. Trading on margin carries high risk and may result in the loss of all assets deposited into the margin account. Additionally, you must fully understand the risks involved in margin trading assets.
serviceAgreement.section2Text1: Capitalized terms used in this MFA, unless defined here, shall have the meanings assigned to them in the User Agreement.
serviceAgreement.section2Item1: 'Assets' refer to any contracts, such as derivatives or futures contracts, or any digital assets.
serviceAgreement.section2Item2: 'Margin' refers to the amount of assets you deposit into a margin account to assume the risks of margin trading.
serviceAgreement.section2Item3: 'Margin Call' refers to a request issued by KeepBit to increase your margin.
serviceAgreement.section2Item4: 'Margin Account' refers to the account that provides you with margin facilities.
serviceAgreement.section2Item5: 'Margin Trading' refers to any transaction that involves buying assets, in whole or in part, with the margin facilities provided to you.
serviceAgreement.section3Text1: The assets in your margin account will be used as collateral for the assets lent to you. If the value of the assets decreases, the collateral will also decrease. Therefore, we may take actions, such as selling collateral held in your margin account or issuing a margin call to maintain the required asset value for the margin account.
serviceAgreement.section4Text1: You should understand that under this MFA, we typically will not issue a margin call or deposit funds into your account or increase your margin to meet margin requirements. Instead, we typically liquidate positions in your margin account without prior notice to meet margin requirements, and you will not have the option to choose which positions to liquidate or the timing or order of liquidation.
serviceAgreement.section5Text1: If we do not liquidate positions but issue a margin call for any reason, you should immediately deposit assets into your margin account to meet the margin call.
serviceAgreement.section6Text1: You may lose more assets than you have deposited in your margin account. A decrease in the value of assets purchased on margin may require you to provide additional assets to avoid liquidation.
serviceAgreement.section7Text1: The margin requirements on this website are for reference only and do not reflect actual margin requirements, which may change rapidly depending on market conditions.
serviceAgreement.section8Text1: We may modify and increase margin requirements at our discretion at any time without prior written notice to you. These changes typically take effect immediately and will affect your existing margin. If your use of margin does not comply with the revised or increased margin requirements, you may be immediately liquidated without further notice.
serviceAgreement.section9Text1: You agree and undertake to maintain your margin within the required range set by us.
serviceAgreement.section10Text1: Our margin requirements or risk control may include position size limits or other restrictions. If these limits are reached or exceeded, you may not be able to place new orders, and you authorize us to liquidate existing positions and/or execute risk-reducing trades on your behalf without notice to restore compliance with margin requirements.
serviceAgreement.section11Text1: To determine if you comply with our margin requirements, we will determine the value of positions and assets in your margin account at our discretion. Our valuations may differ from those published by other markets, and you agree to accept our valuations unconditionally.
serviceAgreement.section12Text1: If your margin falls below the required margin or we modify the margin requirement to a higher value, we may sell assets in your margin account to cover the shortfall. If liquidation is insufficient to cover the gap, you will be legally responsible for making up the shortfall.
serviceAgreement.section13Text1: If the assets in your margin account are insufficient to meet margin requirements, we may refuse any orders and may delay processing any orders while determining the margin status of your account.
serviceAgreement.section14Text1: We are not obligated to contact you before a margin call or liquidation takes effect. Therefore, you should always be aware of the previous margin requirements and how changes to the margin requirements may affect you. You should also ensure that you manage your positions in line with your risk tolerance.
serviceAgreement.section15Text1: Liquidation typically occurs automatically, but despite the above, if your margin account does not meet the margin requirements, we are under no obligation to take any action.
serviceAgreement.section16Text1: If you do not comply with margin requirements, you should not rely on us to close or liquidate positions in your margin account. In particular, you should not rely on automatic liquidation rights and systems as stop-loss orders. You should not assume that we will liquidate positions to prevent your losses from exceeding your deposited amount.
serviceAgreement.section17Text1: You do not have the right to choose which assets to liquidate. We have the sole discretion to decide which positions to liquidate to protect our interests. In the event of insufficient margin, we may allow you to request liquidation of assets in your margin account, but such requests are not binding, and we retain sole discretion in determining which assets to liquidate.
serviceAgreement.section18Text1: Special risks of short selling. Additional risks associated with short-selling assets may result in significant losses. If your margin account does not maintain sufficient margin, we may close your positions by repurchasing assets.
serviceAgreement.section19Text1: You agree that we have the right to liquidate and/or offset all or part of the positions or assets in your margin account at any time and in any manner at our discretion without prior notice.
serviceAgreement.section20Text1: You are responsible for any deficits resulting from or remaining after such liquidation in your margin account and must immediately pay us to cover the deficits.
serviceAgreement.section21Text1: If a liquidation trigger occurs, you agree that we have the exclusive right and discretion to freeze all or part of your margin account or assets and/or exercise your positions on your margin account without prior notice.
serviceAgreement.section22Text1: These terms and margin requirements are designed to protect the integrity of the market, not to protect you.

userBehaviorCode.title: KeepBit User Code of Conduct
userBehaviorCode.section1Text1: KeepBit users agree to adhere to the following behavioral rules to ensure that the KeepBit platform is not used for malicious or manipulative purposes. Any trading activity that disrupts or manipulates digital asset trading is prohibited. The following list is not exhaustive and is intended to provide examples of prohibited activities.
userBehaviorCode.section1Text2: When using the services, your account, or interacting with us, other users, or third parties, you shall:
userBehaviorCode.section1Item1: Not violate any laws, regulations, rules, or ordinances (e.g., laws related to financial services, consumer protection, unfair competition, anti-discrimination, or false advertising);
userBehaviorCode.section1Item2: Not hold or trade digital assets that we reasonably consider to be potentially fraudulent;
userBehaviorCode.section1Item3: Not engage in fraudulent or suspicious activities and/or transactions;
userBehaviorCode.section1Item4: Not engage in activities that place an unreasonable or disproportionate load on our websites, software, systems (including networks and servers used to provide services), or services;
userBehaviorCode.section1Item5: Not promote any viruses, trojans, malware, worms, or other computer programming routines that attempt or may attempt to damage, destroy, corrupt, misuse, or interfere with, intercept, or invade unauthorized access to any system, data, information, or services;
userBehaviorCode.section1Item6: Not place orders for the purpose of creating unnecessary volatility or conditions where prices do not reflect or will not reflect fair market value. This may include artificially buying and selling at the same price to artificially increase trading volume, splitting orders to create more executions and more trading activity, or using consecutive trades to show artificial momentum in a specific direction.
userBehaviorCode.section1Item7: Not place orders solely for the purpose of canceling the buy or sell price before execution.
userBehaviorCode.section1Item8: Not arrange any orders with others for the sole purpose of executing them.
userBehaviorCode.section1Item9: Not place orders to assist others in trading.
userBehaviorCode.section1Item10: Not place buy and sell orders that may execute simultaneously.
userBehaviorCode.section1Text3: KeepBit reserves the right to interpret this agreement.

howRegister.title: How to Register a New Keepbit Account
howRegister.section1Text1: Keepbit welcomes you! Start trading on Keepbit now and enjoy more benefits and privileges.
howRegister.section1Text2: Follow these steps to register a Keepbit account using your email or phone number:
howRegister.section2Text2: Open the app, click 'Register/Login', and follow the instructions to register.
howRegister.section2Item1: To register with an email address, enter your email, invitation code (optional), and click register. Then, enter the verification code sent to your email, set your password, and complete the registration.
howRegister.section2Text3: Invitation code (optional): If you were invited or referred by a friend/service representative, please enter the invitation code.
howRegister.section2Text4: By confirming registration, you automatically agree to the 'User Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy'.
howRegister.section2Text5: Registration complete! Please return to the app homepage and log in to your Keepbit account.
howRegister.section2Text7: Click the homepage icon in the top-left corner to view your personal invitation code and complete KYC verification.
howRegister.section2Text8: In the app settings, you can adjust exchange rates, language preferences, themes, and other personal preferences.
howRegister.section2Text9: In the security settings, you can reset your password, enable or disable two-factor authentication, or deactivate your account.
howRegister.section2Text11: View the market interface and explore features like contract trading, strategy hall, and account assets.
howRegister.section2Text12: In the demo account section, click to apply for demo funds and start simulated trading with all strategies. Begin your trading journey now!
howRegister.section3Text2: Go to the Keepbit official website at https://keepbit.com/, click 'Register' in the top-right corner, and follow the instructions to register.
howRegister.section3Item1: To register with an email address, enter your email, invitation code (optional), and click register. Then, enter the verification code sent to your email, set your password, and complete the registration.
howRegister.section3Text3: Invitation code (optional): If you were invited or referred by a friend/service representative, please enter the invitation code.
howRegister.section3Text4: By confirming registration, you automatically agree to the 'User Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy'.
howRegister.section3Text5: Registration complete! Please go to the login page and log in to your Keepbit account.
howRegister.section3Text7: View the market interface and explore features like contract trading, strategy hall, and account assets. Begin your experience now!
